FuncDef: The display bgp sr-policy update-peer-group command is used to view information about the update peer-group information in the BGP IPv4 SR-Policy address family.

ParaDef.Info:
Specify the index of the update peer group.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp sr-policy update-peer-group command is used to view information about the update peer-group information in the BGP IPv4 SR-Policy address family.
